title: [White Haven, Banquet Hall]
description: A long black walnut table dominates this hall and is surrounded by matching chairs, each engraved with twining vines along the back.  A sideboard of similar decor provides convenient storage for serving dishes, while a few tables of a more private nature are located near the back of the room.  White arabesque winds across the ceiling, the pattern centering on a twining gold chandelier.
